title: War of the Roses: I Like Daddy's "Friend"
description: Hope is wondering if something is going on with her husband, Dan, because their daughter recently said something about liking daddy's friend and when Hope assumed she was talking about his friend Bill, their daughter said, "no, the girl he's friends with".  Is their daughter confused or does Dan have a "girl friend" that Hope doesn't know about?
itunes:summary: Hope is wondering if something is going on with her husband, Dan, because their daughter recently said something about liking daddy's friend and when Hope assumed she was talking about his friend Bill, their daughter said, "no, the girl he's friends with".  Is their daughter confused or does Dan have a "girl friend" that Hope doesn't know about?
